name: Cucumber Salad
description: Loaded with cherry tomatoes, red onions, chickpeas and more, with a bright, lemony flavor!

name: Lettuce with garlic
description: A healthy vegetables dish with light and refreshing taste.

name: Ma Po Tofu
description: A popular dish from Sichuan, offering you a special and spicy experience.

description: A Beijing dish with roasted duck meat and crispy skin wrapped in a thin crepe.

name: Seafood Congee
description: Seafood congee is made with a handful of shrimp, rich shrimp stock and the a couple of small crabs.
